message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $920000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business. What do you think?
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the negotiations we've had so far, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $875000.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm thinking of $900000. What do you think?
I'm glad we're making progress, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $880000.
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm thinking of $890000. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering our previous negotiations, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $885000.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $900000, Bob. I think we've had a good negotiation, and I'm willing to meet you at $885000. I'm willing to split the difference with you. What do you think?
